name: Super Snake Retro - Big Colors
description:
Download this amazing Snake Game and get all the fun of the classic Snake with modern graphics. Simple and addictive!

Eat all the fruits and frogs, become longer, get more points, do combos, and become one of the top players of the leaderboards. Challenge your friends to be the best!

◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- 21 different snakes!
- 6 different maps!
- Classic gameplay!
- Amazing modern graphics!


Have fun by downloading this classic Snake game.

Do not forget to give us a review!
